channel.title: Kombatkraft - [economy] - [warhub] - [multi-verse] - [survival] - [creative]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://mc.kombatsyndicate.com/styles/minecraftbbdark/imageset/site_logo.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=5][b]IP: 85.25.118.16[/b][/size][/center] [center][size=5][b]Website: mc.kombatsyndicate.com[/b][/size][/center]
[size=5][b][img]http://i49.tinypic.com/28be0qu.png[/img][/b][/size]
[center][size=5][b]About Us[/b][/size][/center]
[center][b][size=3]KombatKraft[/size] [/b][size=3]is a brand new amazing Minecraft server with a growing community. We aim to bring you the best survival and creative experience on Minecraft, with the right mods, professional staff and a high spec environment to make sure you will never want to join another server again.[/size][/center]
[size=5][b]Plugins[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Essentails [*]LWC [*]GlobalBank2 [*]BuyCraft [*]ChestShop [*]LogBlock [*]Votifier [*]xAuth [*]WorldGaurd [*]WorldEdit [*]WarHub [*]PermissionsEx [*]Multi-Verse [*]NoCheat+ [*]PlotMe [*]ProtectionStones [*]MineReset [*]BlueTelePads [*]CraftBook[/ul]
[center][size=4][b]Donations[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=3]KombatKraft operates on a high spec server to ensure minimal lag at all times. We spend extra money to provide our users with a better mining experience , but in order to do so we require donations.[/size][/center]
[center][size=3]However, for donating even a small amount you can earn yourself extra perks and rewards in-game which will give you an advantage on our server. (See our website for more information)[/size][/center]
[center][size=4][b]Market[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=3]KombatKraft uses the Essentials iConomy plugin along with ChestShop which means you can earn in-game cash through simple tasks like mining. You can either sell and buy to the Admin Shop located in the Mall at Spawn or make your own shop to Buy/Sell goods.[/size][/center]
[center][b]GreyList[/b][/center]
[center][size=3]KombatKraft currently operates a greylist system in which anyone can join the server as a guest to look around. In order to gain building access and useful commands make a comment here and then visit our websit[/size][size=3]e ([url=http://"http://mc.kombatsyndicate.com/index.php"]http://mc.kombatsynd...e.com/index.php[/url]) and make a Builder Request. Our staff will then accept you and add you to the Builders Group.[/size][/center]
[center][size=5][b][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif]--------------------------------------------[/font][/b][/size][/center] [center][b][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif]IP: 85.25.118.16[/font][/b][/center] [center][b][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif]Website: mc.kombatsyndicate.com[/font][/b][/center] [center][b][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif]--------------------------------------------[/font][/b][/center]

[center][size=5]About Us[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]KombatKraft[/size] [size=3]is a brand new amazing Minecraft server with a growing community. We aim to bring you the best survival and creative experience on Minecraft, with the right mods, professional staff and a high spec environment to make sure you will never want to join another server again.[/size][/center]

[size=5]Plugins[/size]

[ul][]Essentails
[]LWC
[]GlobalBank2
[]BuyCraft
[]ChestShop
[]LogBlock
[]Votifier
[]xAuth
[]WorldGaurd
[]WorldEdit
[]WarHub
[]PermissionsEx
[]Multi-Verse
[]NoCheat+
[]PlotMe
[]ProtectionStones
[]MineReset
[]BlueTelePads
[*]CraftBook[/ul]

[center][size=4]Donations[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]KombatKraft operates on a high spec server to ensure minimal lag at all times. We spend extra money to provide our users with a better mining experience , but in order to do so we require donations.[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]However, for donating even a small amount you can earn yourself extra perks and rewards in-game which will give you an advantage on our server. (See our website for more information)[/size][/center]

[center][size=4]Market[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]KombatKraft uses the Essentials iConomy plugin along with ChestShop which means you can earn in-game cash through simple tasks like mining. You can either sell and buy to the Admin Shop located in the Mall at Spawn or make your own shop to Buy/Sell goods.[/size][/center]

[center]GreyList[/center]

[center][size=3]KombatKraft currently operates a greylist system in which anyone can join the server as a guest to look around. In order to gain building access and useful commands make a comment here and then visit our websit[/size][size=3]e (http://mc.kombatsynd…e.com/index.php) and make a Builder Request. Our staff will then accept you and add you to the Builders Group.[/size][/center]
